digitizer_constants_note: Digitizer constants (nbits, ref_voltage, inv_gain, inv_gain_corr, stage2_gain) must be calculated for each system and filled in by the user.
sender: Geo-Enquire Data Converter and Metadata Tool, Silvana Neves, PLOCAN, Spain
station_description: Hydrophone station at PLOCAN coastal node, 17m below surface (1m above 18m seafloor)
sensor_description: RESON TC4032 differential mode hydrophone, mounted on mooring line at 17m depth. Bandwidth: 5Hz-62.5kHz. Recording on Ch-A. Sensitivity: -164dBV re 1uPa. Gain factors: 1/Gain = 0.168941669, 1/Gain_corr = 1.001419
datalogger_description: RTSYS EA.SD14 digital recorder, 24-bit resolution, recording on Ch-A at 156250 Hz (no filter), downsampled to 300 Hz. Gain factors: 1/Gain = 0.168941669, 1/Gain_corr = 1.001419
